title: A Day in the Life of Marlon Bundo

cover.alt: Book cover showing a white rabbit with large eyes wearing a multicolored bow-tie sitting in the grass with a large white house in the background. Above the illustration is the text 'A Day in the Life of MARLON BUNDO'.  To the right of the rabbit is the text 'Written by Marlon Bundo with Jill Twiss / Illustrated by EG Keller'.

overview: A parody of 'Marlon Bundo's A Day in the Life of the Vice President', this book by Last Week Tonight writer Jill Twiss tells the story of a relationship between two male rabbits, while poking fun at Vice President Pence's opposition to same-sex marriage.  Twiss {ln:https://www.amny.com/entertainment/jill-twiss-marlon-bundo-1-19762700/|said in an interview} 'Our goal was to make something very genuinely for children, that you could also really irritate Mike Pence by buying.' Proceeds from book sales go to the {ln:https://www.thetrevorproject.org/|Trevor Project} and {ln:https://aidsunited.org/|AIDS United}.

incidents.description: Broward County, Florida {ln:https://www.sun-sentinel.com/2022/11/03/broward-schools-memo-on-banning-and-restricting-library-books-spurs-controversy/|ordered this book removed from all school libraries} in 2022.  A document from the committee that directed the removal said that the book was 'inappropriate due to the negativity towards the government'.
